name: The Monster at Night
description:
You have been kept up at night for weeks now.

Over and over again, you would wake up in a cold sweat to see a pair of purple eyes with bright yellow irises stare at you.

After losing your sleep and sanity, the entity finally decides to speak.

Game includes:

2 Endings!!!

A scary and maybe cute creature thing!

A kalimba song that I made at 1am!!!

Music made by: TheChosenGiraffe

Art & Script: TheChosenGiraffe

Special shoutout to the DevTalk community for helping me solve any programming problems! Y'all rock <3
